attributes.action: Stop Money Payments to EU in Place of our NHS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sacrificing our NHS for a proposed £2.5 billion extra each year, feathering the EU nest is not acceptable! So why is it still happening? We the undersigned, Propose you stop this right now, and any other such action, at tax payers and pensioners expense! This money is twice as much as the NHS needs to stop the cuts to services!
